title: Game Music Ultimate Bundle - Vol. 2
description: Get ready for the ultimate gaming experience with this massive collection of original music tracks for use in video games. Divided into two volumes, this bundle offers over 12 hours of music.
longDescription:
Looking for the perfect soundtrack for your video game project? This massive collection of over 390 original music tracks is designed to enhance the gaming experience for players of all types. Divided into two volumes, this bundle offers a staggering 12 hours of music, with 15 essential genres to choose from, including action, adventure, puzzle, RPG, simulation, strategy, sports, casual, and horror.


Each volume contains a carefully selection of tracks, ranging from inspiring menu music to epic orchestral scores, ambient soundscapes, and everything in between. As a game developer, you know that music plays a crucial role in creating an immersive gaming experience. This comprehensive collection of original music tracks has been designed to help you do just that. Whether you're looking for music to set the mood in a fantasy RPG or to pump up the energy in an action-packed shooter, this collection has got you covered.


WHY THIS COLLECTION?


What sets this collection apart is its incredible variety and versatility. With over 390 tracks to choose from 154 unique tracks, each with multiple versions and variations, you'll never run out of options when it comes to finding the perfect soundtrack for your game. Plus, all tracks are delivered in high-quality 16-bit/44.1kHz WAV format, ensuring the best sound quality for your game. The 162 loop-ready tracks are also a significant advantage, as they can help you create a seamless musical experience for players that can last for hours without any noticeable gaps or breaks. With loopable versions, you can easily integrate them into your game engine and create seamless, immersive gameplay experiences. And because all of these tracks come with an Unlimited Royalty-Free License, you can use them in any project without worrying about licensing fees or restrictions. In addition, all tracks can be used freely synchronized in your video game on platforms such as YouTube avoiding copyright claims. So you can monetize your videos on YOUTUBE in a SAFE WAY✔️.


This collection is perfect for indie game developers, AAA studios, and anyone in between who is looking for high-quality, original music to enhance their video game projects. Whether you're creating a mobile game or a console blockbuster, this collection has something for everyone.


———————————————————————————–——————––––––––––——––––––––––——––––––––––——––––––––


GAME MUSIC ULTIMATE BUNDLE – VOL. 2

👇👇Listen Now👇👇

▶️Game Music Ultimate Bundle – Vol. 2


Game Music Ultimate Bundle – Vol. 2 is a high-quality original music designed for royalty-free use un video games. Featuring 4+ hour collection of 194 original tracks. As a developer, you can choose from the collections of combat, sentimental, dark, piano, classical, thriller or retro techno ambience to enhance your game's immersive experience. The music is ideal for games that require intense action, emotional drama, suspenseful thrill and relaxing ambiance. With a total of 77 unique songs and 93 loop-ready tracks, you'll have a wide range of options to choose from.


This volume is organized into eight distinct categories, each designed to serve a particular purpose in your game:


  • Combat Music: Includes intense, electronic, and orchestral music, perfect for games of fantasy, action, and RPGs. These tracks will elevate the excitement of your game's battle scenes, making players feel like they are in the thick of the action.
  • Sentimental Music: Designed to tug at players' heartstrings, featuring highly emotional and dramatic orchestral music. This music is suitable for trailers or games of adventure, RPGs, and visual novels, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in the drama.
  • Dark Side Music: For games of horror, action, and survival, the dark collection features eerie and intense ambient tracks, often atonal and disturbing, to keep players on the edge of their seats. The collection also includes loops, making it ideal for use in games that require long periods of unsettling background music.
  • Piano Music: Features tranquil and intense music with a dramatic charge, designed to add an emotional depth to your game's story. Suitable for adventure games or RPGs, this collection also includes loops, providing endless hours of calming background music.
  • Classical Relax Music: For more peaceful games, the classical relaxation collection includes peaceful and tranquil orchestral music. This collection is perfect for adventure games, RPGs, open-world games, strategy games, or simulation games, allowing players to enjoy a relaxing atmosphere while they play.
  • Thriller Music: For games of mystery and suspense, featuring music that will keep players on the edge of their seats. This collection is perfect for adventure games, RPGs, or simulation games, where the story's twists and turns demand a soundtrack that keeps the player guessing.
  • 90’s Techno Ambient Music: The retro collection offers a blast from the past, featuring electronic ambient music from the '90s. This collection is suitable for games of action, strategy or sports, creating a vintage atmosphere that will appeal to gamers of all ages.
  • Broadcast News Music: The newsroom tracks are designed to provide background music for programs of news and contests. Suitable for adventure games or strategy games.


This collection is perfect for game developers looking to create an immersive and professional gaming experience. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a team, this collection has something for everyone. With a wide range of styles and genres to choose from, you'll be able to find the perfect track for every scene in your game.


So why wait? Start exploring this massive collection of original music tracks today and take your video game projects to the next level!


More info at www.en.danielnunezmartin.com
technicalDetails:
• 194 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44,1 kHz)
  • 77 full-track
  • 93 loopable tracks
  • 4+ hour of music
  • 3,2 GB of music
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license
  • YouTube Safe✔️
